titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the suppressing of profane swearing and cursing.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Announcing a patent to Robert Leslie for the office of receiving fines for swearing.
Dated at end: ... Oatelands, the six and twentieth day of Iuly, in the eleuenth yeare of our reigne.
Arms 24; Steele notation: nine- should 2) ap- and.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and
